## VerticalFlyout.reflowInternal\_() method

Compute width of flyout. toolbox.Position mat under each block. For RTL: Lay out the blocks and buttons to be right-aligned.

```typescript
protected reflowInternal_(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
